snippet: Briton Andy Murray showed no signs of a thigh injury as he dispatched German teenager Alexander Zverev in the punishing Perth heat at the Hopman Cup on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Briton Andy Murray showed no signs of a thigh injury as he dispatched German teenager Alexander Zverev in the punishing Perth heat at the Hopman Cup on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Formidable Murray Too Strong for Zverev in Perth
headline.main: Formidable Murray Too Strong for Zverev in Perth
